page.title: 11PLACES OF WORSHIP
page.content: In our area there has always been a tradition of{Methodism.}In Dawley a Methodist Chapel was built in 1841.The new{Methodist Church Centre}in Dawley was opened in 1978.This multipurpose building is used by local clubs and a playgroup. To celebrate 10 years of Central Telford Anglican Parish, in Nov.'85 the Methodist & Anglicans will sign a{"Local Covenant"}of unity. {S.Leonard's}C of E was designed by {Thomas Telford}& built in 1805. There is a bell tower with 6 bells. {Holy Trinity}C of E was built in 1845 to replace an unafe older church. It has a 12th century font from the earlier church. {S.Paul's}R.C. is a modern church.The priest is Father Craig.Inside the church there are pictures of the Stations of the Cross.
